turkish_example_sentence: Ben dün akşam önemli bir proje yapacaktım ama yorgun idim.
english_example_sentence: I was going to do an important project yesterday evening but I was tired.
russian_example_sentence: Я собирался делать важный проект вчера вечером, но я был усталым.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben dün akşam önemli bir proje ______ ama yorgun idim.
